column5: Was in Vermilion Bay the other day.Nice and sunny and -26c.Snapped a pick of the government dock.Looks a lot nicer in the summer.Usually a plowed winter road going to Strawberry Island where there is some good evening walleye action and lake trout.Pretty quite it seems.
Go there early morning pick some strawberry for strawberry pancakes then catch some eyes n lake trout doesn't get any better than that
Haha.funny.maybe catch fish first then go to coop and buy some strawberries
John I didn't know vermillion had a co-op probably bigger strawberry's there rather than the island,do they keep a plowed road open up until April 15?

We have a co op store.strawberries will be fresher .road might be plowed we will have to wait and see what kind of conditions there are when you get up here.everythibg woukd depend on snow load we will have.not much melting yet in early march. Road will be plowed from cabin to shack though.
Sounds good John,I guess there will be no exercise if you can drive up to the door of the schack,jaws will get exercise snacking all day in the schack haha,take care
